original_title: マジックミラー凌● 壁の外だから安心安全。少女に遠隔鬼畜いたずらワンダーランド るるちゃ。
overview: A man who is so shy that he doesn't want to take off his mask in public confines JK's Ruru-chan. The man locks himself up in his house with a magic mirror and watches him earnestly. If it's here, she's safe and secure, and she won't be able to see it. Although Ruru-chan knows that nothing will be done, she is only allowed to take one-sided communication and she is gradually tormented by fear. She is so scared that she can only listen to what the man says, and she is gradually trained by him.
title: Magic Mirror Ryo ● Safe And Sound behind a Wall. Remote Devil Mischief Wonderland Rurucha
